title: Allow a Leaver to take a Leaver's blame
body: Sometimes I just had to leave a game or go AFK because my baby girl is crying or i gets a call from work, i can't stop it from happening and i sure as hell can't ignore them. I feel bad when i had to leave knowing I most likely cost 4 other people some hard earn LP. So please add in a feature to allow a leaver to take the blame for losing the game, take more LP of me and have no affect on other teammate. It would make me feel better when I just have to go for important reason.
